titles.title: A bill for the relief of Frank H. Gammache, Jr.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of his claims against the United States arising out of a loss of income which resulted from the United States' unsuccessful pursuit of a civil action against him.
